Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: A de ren ceng fouren shizhe
Dangshi, tamen de dixiong hu de ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne
Wo duiyu nimen, que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you quan shijie de zhu fudan
Nimen zai gao dishang jianzhu yige jinian wu, yi gong youxi
Nimen sheli yixie baolei, hao xiang nimen jiang yong ju chenshi yiyang
Nimen chengzhi (taren) de shihou, nimen shi hen canku de
Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Nimen yingdang jingwei zhu, ta yi nimen suo zhidao de shangci nimen
ta shangci nimen shengchu he zisi
Wo dique haipa nimen zaoshou zhongda ri de xingfa.”
Tamen shuo:“Wulun ni quangao yu fou, zhe duiyu women shi yiyang de
Women jue bu hui shou chengfa de.”
Tamen fouren ta, wo jiu huimiele tamen. Ci zhong dique you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
